text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Phee～w! Shrines are just great. I feel cleansed of all kinds of things!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I've been lacking in Bakushin lately. Or rather, I should say I thought I'd been feeling out of sorts, but…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: That's right! I feel like I can solve aaaany problem, without hesitation!
――Uwaa～h! What am I supposed to do～～!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ohh! Excellent timing, troubled voice! Let's have the class president handle this!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Oya! It's Ms. Biko! What seems to be the problem!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: Bakushin O-Senpai! I don't know what I'm supposed to doo―!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: Heroes have to constantly come up with new special moves to fight evil, but…

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: I can't think of anything! I've asked God for help, and I've gotten none!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I see! Then, this class president and honor student! Leave it to this brainiac!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Decidedly! All you need, is Bakushin!
choice_data_list: What happened to that brain of yours!?
What happened to that brain of yours!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Huh? Therefore, if you Bakushin, you can… if you, then, ehh～～……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Oh, yes! I meant, all different sorts of things stimulate the brain!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Come, now! Straight at the sun～… Bakushinbakushiiiiiiii――――n!!!!!!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: Ooh! It's like a training session, a passionate one! Bakushinbakushiii―n!!
They took off towards the sun, and I hurriedly chased after them…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hah… hah……!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Fufu, the sunset when you're able to Bakushin with all your might is… spectacularly special, isn't it!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: Aaah! Bakushin's super awesome! I feel so refreshed, and now I can do my special move――

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: Ha! That's right! Make that run you just did into an entrance pose…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Haaa-ha-ha-haa―! What do you think! This is the class president's plan! It's the power of Bakushin!
Sakura Bakushin O smiles with satisfaction, and it looks like her condition has improved nicely!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Haah… haaah……
choice_data_list: Looks like your condition's not great after all…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: N, no! This is no reason to stop my legs!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: … No, right here is just fine! I can totally feel your enthusiasm, Bakushin O-Senpai!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: Don't give up, just keep trying! I'm going to use my special move, my guts, to inspire you!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Uuuugh… I regret that I cannot help you……
Even though she paid her respects at the shrine, Sakura Bakushin O wasn't back in shape…
